author: Vandana Rambaran, Bryan Llenas
title: Coronavirus forces over 16 percent of FDNY members to call out sick, official says
description: Almost 16.5 percent of FDNY members were out sick on Tuesday as the number of those infected with coronavirus within the department surged to 282.
content:
Almost 16.5 percent of FDNY members were out sick on Tuesday as the number of those infected with coronavirus within the department surged to 282.
Out of 17,000 FDNY members, 2,800 were out sick -- 23 percent are EMS workers and 16 percent are firefighters, … [+1425 chars]
